QuestData.Title: A Message of Terrible Import
QuestData.Description: Your scout... he got me out of that hellish place. Fel orcs surprised us out in the jungle and dragged us up the mountain. They tortured us... killed all but me. I fear one of us may have given up our secret before the end.$b$bI must ask you to go to the home of our order. Speak with Lagar, my leader, tell him... tell him Gul'dan knows.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Vault of the Earth and speak with Lagar the Wise.
QuestData.RewardText: We will speak more of this later, but thank you.

Objectives.Objective: Go to the Vault of the Earth
